website_summaries.verdict: A gentle but effective exfoliant that is ideal for weekly use.
pros: Water-based exfoliant is ideal for oily or combination skin
Small, concentrated grains effectively exfoliate skin without being too harsh
Formula has a refreshing, minty tingle that causes no drying or itching
Leaves skin feeling silky, with a smooth even finish
cons: The tingling sensation may be overwhelming for sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic exfoliator for acne prone clogged skin
customer_reviews.text: My face breaks out like crazy wearing a mask all day, my pores clog really easy and I’ve finally found an exfoliant that ACTUALLY works and doesn’t make my face dry, peel, flake, or breakout worse!! I use this probably 4-5 times a week. Easy scent, light texture, not too gritty or too fine. It’s by far been my favorite one I’ve come across. I’ve been using it for about 6 months now. One tube lasts me a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Bree King

customer_reviews.title: You will love this scrub
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It's been around for years. It scrubs the face with tiny, gritty particles. It has a cool, tingling feeling as well. When done, face is smooth and feels super clean. Price from seller is the same as the major department stores. But it came fast and I saved a trip to the crowded mall. Buy it, you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Why this?
customer_reviews.text: This does not even deserve a one star rating! I bought a new product, but what was delivered to me was cut open and had no seal on the tube. What in the world is going on? Am I not supposed to trust any product that is sold on Amazon, anymore??
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my skin smooth as silk
customer_reviews.text: I went out of my way to order precisely this product, because I had used it from department stores but liked the convenience of ordering online as a Prime customer of Amazon. The reason I like this product is that it leaves my face smooth and soft with just the right amount of abrasive particles to get rid of dry skin cells without being too abrasive. I am a repeat customer, as I have never found such a wonderful exfoliant in another brand. I use it every time I shower and feel wonderful afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C

customer_reviews.title: Bring it back Clinique.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for 25 years and now is discontinued. So bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Beth A Marks

customer_reviews.title: ... years so I am very familiar with it and love it. However the grit of this particular container ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years so I am very familiar with it and love it. However the grit of this particular container is much finer than usual and doesn't scrub as well. Maybe Clinique has changed the product? Not sure, but not as happy with it as I usually am.
customer_reviews.author: Supersolid

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several different brands and kinds of scrubs and keep coming back to this one. It cleans and smoothes my skin, gets rid of all those little bumps, makes my skin smooth and soft. I use it daily. It's not too harsh.
customer_reviews.author: ShawnsMomma

customer_reviews.title: Recommended on oily skins and to use it once a ...
customer_reviews.text: Not all Clinique products works for me but this is one that really works on me. Recommended on oily skins and to use it once a week. you don't want to stimulate grease
customer_reviews.author: Skarling P.

customer_reviews.title: Good for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I think I like this products because it makes wonders with our face, it can really improve really fast black heads and acne, however I won't recommend this for a dry skin I think it will be a little to much for people that has already dry skin maybe something softer will be more beneficial. But for me this (normal skin with T zone) works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jezy L

customer_reviews.title: It's good, but beware! This is "best for oily skin"
customer_reviews.text: Despite the amazon description "recommended for normal skin", the product actually says it's best for oily skin. I have dry skin, so I wish I'd known this before buying. I just won't use it too often. It does seem like a good thorough exfoliator, though. It rinses off very well without leaving a residue.
customer_reviews.author: M. Burdick

customer_reviews.title: NOT just for women !
customer_reviews.text: I actually prefer this exfoliating scrub over the Men's ! I use every time before shaving and many times in between ! Honestly, I wouldn't shave without it as it helps lift & soften the beard, LOVE IT ...!!
customer_reviews.author: HSKRFRK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deep exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: Product is the BOMB Good ole Clinique What a refined clean feeling and look
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this scrub from Clinique! This is one of the best exfoliators I use. I have now switched to 'Paula's Choice' products and got an exfoliator I don't need to be scrubbing so hard on my skin, which is actually better!
customer_reviews.author: Denise M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Oil Skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product - does not cause breakout. Does a good job of deep cleaning your face and does not cause dryness.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Fran

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Great quality from clinique, as always. I use this once a week - it helps keep the old in my combination skin under control.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Spa at home
customer_reviews.text: I adore this scrub. The eucalyptus tingles and the fine grains really remove dead skin cells, leaving skin feeling fresh and renewed.
customer_reviews.author: Otis Potus

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is not greasy like the 7 day scrub. Plenty of micro beads that don't scratch like apricot pits. Refreshing menthol and it washes off easily. Keeps my pores clean and prevents breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: M. MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: I like it is not an ultra fine scrub
customer_reviews.text: My go to scrub for many years. Light mint undertone that feels cooling. I like it is not an ultra fine scrub. Does deep exfoliation when needed, but I don't thing it's too rough either. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Don't need too much product. Definitely an abrasive exfoliator, more for a man's face. Doesn't seem to clog pores, no breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego Robert

customer_reviews.title: Too Thick/Hardened
customer_reviews.text: This is so thick i can barely squeeze it out. I believe it’s out of date. I’m finding several items I’ve ordered are coming from products that are pass the useable date.
customer_reviews.author: James K. Doss

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin feel like new
customer_reviews.text: Great skin exfoliater. This product does really brighten up the skin and scuff off dead skin cells.
customer_reviews.author: Bluebeach

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I use it once a week for a good facial. I like it a lot, my skin feels softer and smoother since I began using it. My only complaint was the shipping cost, which seemed rather expensive for a small product.
customer_reviews.author: Anne E.

customer_reviews.title: Best exfoliating scrub for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin and this is the best scrub I've tried so far. Extremely concentrated and paste-like, not like other scrubs that mainly consist of liquid and a few scrub beads. Makes skin feel extremely fresh, clean and free of all dirt and blackheads. When used 2-3 times/week, the tube lasts about 3 months. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Best facial product
customer_reviews.text: I live where you can't buy this product but online. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jeyne

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It's worth every penny. I use it every 2-3 days, and no longer have acne. When I stop using it, the acne comes back. It also makes my skin feel soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Beagle

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! My face always feels so good after I use it.
customer_reviews.author: 2BoysMom

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very harsh on the face. Too strong to the point it can hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Decker

customer_reviews.title: Uses microplastics that pollute oceans and rivers and threaten marine life.
customer_reviews.text: Clinique used to be my favorite brand, but is one of the companies that use tiny spherical particles of polyethylene in their scrubs as an abrasive. Billions of tiny plastic beads are polluting lakes, rivers and oceans and harming fish and other wildlife. I'll never buy this product again, and will only buy from companies that use sugar or salt or benign natural materials instead.
customer_reviews.author: miaoux

customer_reviews.title: Excelent Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this exfoliating scrub, I use it two to three times a week and now that I'm in my 50's, I, "maybe We", need all the help we can get. Gently with my finger tips all over my face and neck, you simply can't go wrong as long as you don't have super sensitive skin, I've tried the Alpha Hydroxy products and what a burn, was just too strong, I will even use a mud mask ever three or four months during warmer weather
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Ponton

product_meta.title: Clinique Exfoliating Scrub for Unisex, 3.4 Ounce
product_meta.description: Skin-clearing, water-based scrub for strong, oily skins. De-flakes, refines, softens tiny lines. Leaves skin refreshed.
feature_bullets: Exfoliating scrub was launched by the design house of Clinique
It is recommended for normal skin

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
